arts.sum: Bologna were moments away from a precious victory away to Lecce, but were stunned by...

arts.ttl: Lecce take on Bologna to get back on track
arts.sum: There have been 24 official encounters between the two teams in Salento: 6 home victories, 12 draws, and 6 wins for the Emilian side. Riccardo Orsolini has brought 4 points to Bologna with his goals so far, securing home victories against Como and Genoa.
